gurmukhi: jwix n jwey mweIAW; jUJy sUrmy ]43]
transliteration: Jaan(i) Na Jaae Maaeeaan Joojhe Soorme||43||
translation: The brave fighters could not even be recognized by their mothers, who gave birth to them.43.
Sumbh heard the bad news about the death of Sranwat Beej;

gurmukhi: rx ivic iknY n JwlI; durgw AWvdI ]
transliteration: Ran Vich(i) Kinai Na Dhaalidurgad Aanvadee||
translation: And that none could withstand the marching Durga in the battlefield.

gurmukhi: bhuqy bIr jtwlI; au~Ty AwK kY ]
translation: Many brave fighters with matted hair got up saing;

gurmukhi: cotW pwn qbwlI; jwsn ju`D nUM ]
translation: That drummers should sound the drums because they would go for war.

gurmukhi: Qir Qir ipRQmI cwlI; dlW cVMidAW ]
translation: When the armies marched, the earth trembled;

gurmukhi: nwau ijvyhY hwlI; shu drIAwau ivic ]
translation: Like the shaking boat, which is still in the river.
The dust arose with the hooves of the horses;

gurmukhi: jwix pukwrU cwlI; DrqI ieMdR QY ]44]
translation: And it seemed that the earth is going to Indra for a complaint.44.

gurmukhi: Awhir imilAw AwhrIAW; sYx sUirAW swjI ]
transliteration: Aahar(i) Miliaa Aadareeaan Sain Soorkaan Saajee||
translation: The willing workers got engaged in work and as warriors they equipped the army.

gurmukhi: c`ly sauhy durgswh; jx kwbY hwjI ]
transliteration: Challe Sauhe Durgsaah Jaan Kaabai Haajee||
translation: They marched in front of Durga, like pilgrims going for Haj to Kaabah (Mecca).

gurmukhi: qIrI qygI jmDVI; rx vMfI BwjI ]
translation: They are inviting the warriors in the battlefield through the medium of arrows, swords and daggers.

gurmukhi: iek Gwiel GUmn sUrmy; jx mkqb kwjI ]
transliteration: Ik Ghaail Ghooman Soorme Jan Maktab Kaajee||
translation: Some wounded warriors are swinging like the Quadis in the school, reciting the holy Quran.
